languages.text: {n}Что-то в лице Инцендии меняется, на нем написаны стыд и уязвимость. Прежде вы видели такую гримасу у нее лишь раз — когда речь зашла о ее презренной предшественнице, Аспис Чорда. Инцендия сжимается, будто чувствует, что вам ведома ее слабость.{/n}

{n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то в лице Инцендии меняется, на нем написаны стыд и уязвимость. Прежде вы видели такую гримасу у нее лишь раз — когда речь зашла о ее презренной предшественнице, Аспис Чорда. Инцендия сжимается, будто чувствует, что вам ведома ее слабость.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Something changes about Incendia's face. Shame and vulnerability show through on it. You've only seen that grimace on her face once before. It was at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses up, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

{n}Something changes about Incendia's face. Shame and vulnerability show through on it. You've only seen that grimace on her face once before. It was at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses up, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

{n}Something changes about Incendia's face. Shame and vulnerability show through on it. You've only seen that grimace on her face once before. It was at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses up, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

{n}Something changes about Incendia's face. Shame and vulnerability show through on it. You've only seen that grimace on her face once before. It was at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses up, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

{n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

{n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅的脸色变了，心中的羞愧与脆弱暴露无遗。你之前只在她脸上见过一次这种痛苦的表情，那就是提起她卑劣的前任阿斯拜丝·库尔达时。因森蒂娅缩着身子，浑身紧绷，似乎意识到了你能察觉到她的脆弱。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅的脸色变了，心中的羞愧与脆弱暴露无遗。你之前只在她脸上见过一次这样的表情，那就是提起她卑劣的前任阿斯拜丝·库尔达时。因森蒂娅缩着身子，浑身紧绷，似乎意识到了你能感觉到她的脆弱。{/n}

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの表情が変わった。羞恥心と赤裸々な弱さがあらわになった。彼女の苦悶の表情は、過去に一度だけ見たことがある。それは卑劣な前任者、アスパイス・コーダについて言及された時だった。インセンディアは縮こまり、緊張し、自身の弱さを感じ取られていることに気づいているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの表情が変わった。羞恥心と赤裸々な弱さがあらわになった。彼女の苦悶の表情は、過去に一度だけ見たことがある。それは卑劣な前任者、アスパイス・コーダについて言及された時だった。インセンディアは縮こまり、緊張し、自身の弱さを感じ取られていることに気づいているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Algo cambia en el rostro de Incendia, que ahora refleja vergüenza y vulnerabilidad. Solo habías visto esa expresión torturada en su rostro una vez: al mencionar a su despreciable predecesora, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia se encoge y se tensa, como si supiera que puedes sentir su debilidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo cambia en el rostro de Incendia. La vergüenza y la vulnerabilidad se reflejan en él. Solo habías visto esa expresión en su rostro una vez. Fue al mencionar a su despreciable predecesora, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia se encoge y se tensa, como si supiera que puedes sentir su debilidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In Incendias Miene ändert sich etwas. Scham und Verletzlichkeit schimmern durch. Du hast diesen gepeinigten Ausdruck bisher nur ein einziges Mal auf ihrem Gesicht gesehen. Bei der Erwähnung ihrer verhassten Vorgängerin Aspyce Chorda. Incendia schrumpft zusammen und ihr ganzer Körper spannt sich an, als wäre ihr bewusst, dass du ihre Schwäche spüren kannst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In Incendias Miene ändert sich etwas. Scham und Verletzlichkeit schimmern durch. Du hast diese Grimasse bisher nur ein einziges Mal auf ihrem Gesicht gesehen. Bei der Erwähnung ihrer verhassten Vorgängerin Aspyce Chorda. Incendia schrumpft zusammen und ihr ganzer Körper spannt sich an, als wäre ihr bewusst, dass du ihre Schwäche spüren kannst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Incendia change, laissant entrevoir sa honte et sa vulnérabilité. Vous ne l'avez vue afficher cette expression qu'une seule fois auparavant : à la mention de son ignoble prédécesseure, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia se recroqueville et se crispe, comme si elle réalisait que vous percevez sa faiblesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Incendia change, laissant entrevoir sa honte et sa vulnérabilité. Vous ne l'avez vue afficher cette expression qu'une seule fois auparavant : à la mention de son ignoble prédécesseure, Aspyce Chorda. Elle se recroqueville et se crispe, comme si elle réalisait que vous percevez sa faiblesse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın yüzünde bir şeyler değişiyor, ortaya utanç ve açık bir savunmasızlık çıkıyor. Yüzünde bu kederli ifadeyi daha önce sadece bir kez görmüştün, o da habis selefi Aspyce Chorda'nın adını andığında. İncendia siniyor ve gerginleşiyor. Zayıflığını hissettiğinin farkında gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something changes in Incendia's face, revealing shame and naked vulnerability. You have seen that tortured expression on her face only once before, at the mention of her despicable predecessor, Aspyce Chorda. Incendia shrinks and tenses, as if aware that you can sense her weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın yüzünde bir şeyler değişiyor, ortaya utanç ve açık bir savunmasızlık çıkıyor. Yüzünde bu kederli ifadeyi daha önce sadece bir kez görmüştün, o da habis selefi Aspyce Chorda'nın adını andığındaydı. İncendia siniyor ve gerginleşiyor. Zayıflığını hissettiğinin farkında gibi.{/n}
